contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 10th day of December, 2015, the Application for Leave to File Original Process and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus and Other Extraordinary Relief are DISMISSED. See Commonwealth v. Ali, 608 Pa. 71, 10 A.3d 282 (2010) (providing that hybrid representation is improper). The Prothonotary is DIRECTED to forward the filings to counsel of record.
